member.name: T:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Metrical.BasicSensorMapping
member.summary: Create a basic mapping of the environment.
member.remarks: This mapping is based on the Unity transform and sensor values of the robot. You can easly use this mapping for path finding or segmentation purposes by using the mMapMat matrix output. In this 1-channel output, a low value means an obstacle.

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Metrical.BasicSensorMapping.mUltraSoundSensors
member.summary: Ultra sound sensors.

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Metrical.BasicSensorMapping.mInfraRedSensors
member.summary: Infrared sensors.

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Metrical.BasicSensorMapping.Init
member.summary: Called once at the beginning.

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Metrical.BasicSensorMapping.ProcessMapping
member.summary: Called at each frame.
member.remarks: Gets all current odometric and sensor value in order to apply a basic mapping of the environment. The resulting mapping is stocked in mMapMat, then converted to mMapTexture for Unity display.

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Metrical.BasicSensorMapping.UpdatePosition(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Updates the absolute position of the robot in the map.

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Metrical.BasicSensorMapping.UpdateObstacles(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Process a basic mapping based on input datas.
member.param: Value of the left ultrasound sensor
Value of the right ultrasound sensor
Value of the left infrared sensor
Value of the middle infrared sensor
Value of the right infrared sensor

member.name: T:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM
member.summary: Extendend Kalman Filter that is made for SLAM applciation It estimates robot pose.

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.MAX_LANDMARKS
member.summary: Maximum landmarks number.

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mStateVector
F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mStateRobot
member.summary: Robot state, this corresponds to the three first coordinates of X. [x_robot, y_robot, theta_robot]

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mStateLandmarks
member.summary: Landmarks position. [x1_landmark, , y1_landmark, ..., xn_landmark, yn_landmark]

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mCovarianceMat
member.summary: The covariance matrix P, it contains : - the covariance on the robot position A : [3,3] - the covariance on the landmarks B(1st one), C(last one) : [2,2] - the covariance between robot position and landmarks D : [2,3], E = Dt - the covariance between the landmarks G : [2,2]

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mPrr
member.summary: The covariance of the robot, it corresponds to P(0,0,3,3) Prr = [3x3]

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mKalmanGain
F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mJacobianPredictionModel_A
member.summary: Jacobian of the measurement model H [2x3] [(x_robot-lamda_x)/r, (y_robot-lamda_y)/r, 0 ; (lamda_y-y_robot)/r^2, (lamda_x-x_robot)/r^2, -1] with r = sqrt((lamda_x-x_robot)^2+(lamda_y-y_robot)^2)

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mJxr
member.summary: Jacobian Jxr

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mJz
member.summary: Jacobian Jz

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mProcessNoise_Q
member.summary: Process noise Q Q = WCWt, with W = [deltaT*cos(theta), deltaT*sin(theta), deltaThta]t, and C a gaussian noise

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mMeasurementNoise_R
member.summary: Measurement noise R

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.mDiffState
member.summary: The predicted displacement of the robot : (deltaX, deltaY, deltaT)

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.Init
member.summary: Initialize all EKF matrixes and other variables

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.Predict(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Here, we update the current state using the odometry data, and the commands.
member.param: This is the robot pose estimated form odometry data and command.

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.Correct(System.Collections.Generic.List{OpenCVUnity.Point})
member.summary: Corrects robot pose estimation using kalman gain.
member.param: The list of the position of the observed landmarks

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.AddNewLandmarks(System.Collections.Generic.List{OpenCVUnity.Point})
member.summary: Add new landmarks to the list of observed landmarks.

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.AddNewLandmark(OpenCVUnity.Point)
member.summary: Add a new landmark to the covariance matrix and set the other matrixes.

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.ComputeRange(UnityEngine.Vector3,OpenCVUnity.Point)
member.summary: Computes the range value : range = sqrt((iLamdaY - iYRobot)^2+(iLamdaX - iLamdaX)^2).

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Sources.SLAM.Impl.EKFSLAM.ComputeBearing(UnityEngine.Vector3,OpenCVUnity.Point)
member.summary: Computes the bearing value : bearing = atan((LamdaY - YRobot)/(LamdaX - LamdaX)) - ThetaRobot.

member.name: T:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAMMode
member.summary:
Mode of the topological SLAM.
NONE : Do nothing. You can simply disable the script otherwise.
SLAM : Load an existing map, build an other map and processed to a localization at each LOCALIZATION_PERIOD and try to find match with existing node for building a bigger map. Only use this mode if Buddy has an incomplete map.
MAPPING : Only the Landmark mapping will be called.
AUTO_LOC : Load the map and processed to a localization at each LOCALIZATION_PERIOD.
MANUAL_LOC : Load the map and processed to localization only when Localization() is called.

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAMMode.NONE
member.summary: Do nothing. You can simply disable the script otherwise

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAMMode.SLAM
member.summary: Load an existing map, build an other map and processed to a localization at each LOCALIZATION_PERIOD and try to find match with existing node for building a bigger map. Only use this mode if Buddy has an incomplete map

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAMMode.MAPPING
member.summary: Only the Landmark mapping will be called

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAMMode.AUTO_LOC
member.summary: Load the map and processed to a localization at each LOCALIZATION_PERIOD

member.name: F:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAMMode.MANUAL_LOC
member.summary: Load the map and processed to localization only when Localization() is called

member.name: T:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAM
member.summary: Topological SLAM based on a landmark mapping and a landmark localization through an existing map. Use SetMode(mode) to switch mode A basic localization can be processed by calling Localization() For localization and find overlapping map (existing map + building map from unknown area), use LocalizationAndMapping()

member.name: P:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAM.LocalizationStrategy
member.summary: The estimate localization strategy from a set of localization

member.name: P:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAM.ConjecturalLocalizations
member.summary: Assumption of localization

member.name: P:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAM.EstimatedLocalization
member.summary: Estimated position of the robot. The localization is weighted with accuracy of conjectural localizations

member.name: P:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAM.EstimatedOrientation
member.summary: Estimated orientation of the robot. The orientation is weighted with accuracy of each observation's orientation

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAM.LocalizationAndMapping
member.summary: Checks if the current (building) localization is similare to an existing node. If so for two differents localizations, the method will makes a remapping of the whole building graph to to the coordinate system of the existing map. Use it only if a map was already created previously and is uncompleted. Estimated localization and orientation are updated as processed in Localization().

member.name: M:BuddyFeature.Mapping.Topological.LandmarkSLAM.Localization
member.summary: Update estimated localization and orientation based on current point of view of the robot.
